name: HDLSmartHome
0:
”Alexa,Turn on my lights”
”Alexa,Open my curtain”
”Alexa,set the my lights of brightness to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Please download the HDL ON App and register and log in to your HDL account. After you have debugged your device, you can search for "HDL Smart Home" in the skill store of the Alexa App, authorize to bind your HDL account, and then use Alexa voice Control HDL smart devices such as lights, curtains, switches and smart scenes.
